name: Esc-Ape
description:
This game was made in two days for the 17th edition of the GM(48) game jam, it's still pretty much just an idea, with only 4 little levels, don't expect much.

You have to avoid yellow skulls while clicking bananas and or/ragequitting, good luck, have fun.

If I make a full game out of this I'll put it here, keep waiting for now.
